title: "Swiss robotics company opens Alpharetta facility"
excerpt: "The event marked the opening of ABB Robotics’ new Alpharetta facility, a sales center for the Swiss company’s automation technology geared toward the packaging and logistics industry. ABB Robotics’ $2 million investment comes as manufacturers and logistics companies increasingly turn to automation to improve their operations amid a shortage of workers."
